description: Oral communication is an essential part of science and mathematics. Students work closely with a faculty member to learn and practice important aspects of communicating technical information to both expert and non-expert audiences. Enrollment by permission of instructor only. Prerequisite: Previous participation in summer communication series.
name: Comm Science and Math
prerequisites: Previous participation in summer communication series.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Previous participation in summer communication series.

title: Communicating Science and Mathematics
